sections.title: 1. Project Scope
sections.content: The scope of work will be defined and agreed upon before starting. Any additional requests may require extra time and cost.

sections.title: 2. Payment Terms
sections.content: Projects usually require a 50% deposit upfront and the remaining 50% upon completion. Payments are non-refundable after work begins.

sections.title: 3. Client Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for providing all necessary materials (text, images, logos, etc.) in a timely manner to avoid project delays.

sections.title: 4. Revisions
sections.content: Up to 2 rounds of revisions are included. Additional changes beyond that may incur extra charges.

sections.title: 5. Ownership & Copyright
sections.content: Once full payment is made, you will own the final website and all associated deliverables, except for third-party assets or licenses.

sections.title: 6. Hosting & Domains
sections.content: If requested, I can assist with hosting and domain setup. Otherwise, hosting is your responsibility.

sections.title: 7. Maintenance
sections.content: Ongoing support or maintenance is not included by default unless specified in the agreement or purchased separately.

sections.title: 8. Termination
sections.content: Either party may terminate the project at any time. You will be billed for any completed work up to the termination point.

sections.title: 9. Liability
sections.content: I will do my best to deliver a secure and functional website, but I'm not liable for damages, losses, or downtime once the project is handed off.
